description: Monitors key air quality and environmental factors for a laboratory setting.

contents.name: co2
contents.description: Concentration of carbon dioxide in parts per million. Safe lab window: 400-1000 ppm (Ideal), Warning > 1000 ppm, Critical > 1500 ppm.

contents.name: humidity
contents.description: Relative humidity. Safe lab window: 30-60%. Values outside this range may affect equipment or comfort.

contents.name: temperature
contents.description: Air temperature in degrees Celsius. Safe lab window: 20-24°C (68-75.2°F).

contents.name: pm2_5
contents.description: Concentration of particulate matter < 2.5 micrometers in micrograms per cubic meter. Safe lab window: <= 12 µg/m³ (Good Air Quality).

contents.name: serialNumber
contents.description: The serial number for the device.
